docs.text: `run lola run' , a german import that gained a stellar reputation at the sundance film festival , is a dazzling and kinetic film that deals with the subjects of fate and chance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for a berserk and retroactive 81 minutes of non-stop movement , we follow a fiery-haired heroine named lola ( franka potente ) as she sprints to save her boyfriend from the clutches of drug dealers .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: lola has roughly twenty minutes to somehow retrieve 100 , 000 marks in time to save manni ( moritz bleibtreu ) from being killed by the dealer .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but , in something of a pseudo- `groundhog day' approach , director tom tykwer gives lola three separate chances to best navigate her way toward the goal .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in these trio of episodes , we gradually learn the unique effects of fate , for even if tiny changes are made in lola's journey , the future can be seriously altered .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: `run lola run' is an experience like `fight club' or `the matrix' , in that each film takes you through a super-charged wormhole of bending reality in surreal and exciting ways .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: in addition , all three movies have a visual style that separates them from the rest of the pack .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: `lola' is no exception , with stylish quick-flash camera work and cinematography that serves as scintillating eye candy from the get-go .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: tykwer's world is a landscape of mood and color , with brilliant shades of red and pink ( including lola's fiery hair ) used as effective symbolism throughout .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with it's visual style and mind-blowing pace , `run lola run' is one of the more invigorating movies of the year .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: even more so when considering the fact it's all stuffed rather nonchalantly into an 81-minute time period .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as a heroine , potente does little more than run wildly through the streets ( as the title suggests ) , but she has a certain flair and charisma .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: her exemplary running form made me wonder if she is actually a track star .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: meanwhile , bleibtreu does an equally fantastic job of bringing the dopey but passionate manni to life .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: both actors perform beyond the call of duty .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the dazzling fun comes from predicting what each episode holds in store for lola , and the outcome is ultimately rewarding - several twists and turns are unique and unexpected .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the other characters lola runs into ( both purposely and inadvertently ) include her banker father ( herbert kraup ) and a friendly security guard ( armin rohde ) , but aside from the two leads , no one has more than a few minutes of screen time .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: additional stars that couldn't possibly be ignored are cinematographer frank griebe and editor mathilde bonnefroy , who are both responsible for the film's eye-catching visual elegance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: `run lola run' is subtitled , so be prepared to meet the challenge of reading the lightning-fast dialogue - occasional sections of it are especially fast .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is only one of the minor chores involved in watching .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the other is the sense that we never get to really recognize who the real people are in this hyperactive situation .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: most are just chess pieces in tykwer's elaborate game of visual presentation , and he never really makes a significant move with any .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: but , the average viewer is likely to be so absorbed in the action that few will realize the lack of potency in a few elements of the screenplay .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: a few petty gripes aside , this film is a wild , exhilarating ride that turns maniacally on its wheel of originality .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: most people believe foreign films are mainly boring , talky character studies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: perhaps `run lola run' will recharge their batteries .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: not only does this film offer insight into some intriguing questions of fate and destiny , it also delivers a white-knuckle visual rollercoaster ride of overwhelming audacity .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: like how the experience must have been for the persistent title character , `run lola run' is exhausting .
docs.label: positive
